game.name: Forehead Chip
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Join the IMPLANT CORPS and capture the most HOLDOUTS to win the FOREHEAD CHIP in this pixel-art platformer inspired by 80s and 90s sci-fi. Play a single-player story mode with multiple endings, or battle with your friends in a variety of arenas!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Join the IMPLANT CORPS and capture the most HOLDOUTS to win the FOREHEAD CHIP in this pixel-art platformer inspired by 80s and 90s sci-fi. Play a single-player story mode with multiple endings, or battle with your friends in a variety of arenas!
